tag.Name: UD_FleshGolems_CorpseDescription
tag.Value: =subject.UD_xTag:2:U:UD_FleshGolems_CorpseText:Components= are brought =subject.uD_xTag:UD_FleshGolems_CorpseText:WretchedVerbs= back into a horrific facsimile of life. =subject.UD_xTag:UD_FleshGolems_CorpseText:UnappealingAdjectives= =subject.uD_xTag:2:U:UD_FleshGolems_CorpseText:UnsettlingNoises= escape =subject.possessive= every movement and twist the gut of anyone unfortunate enough to hear it.

xtagTextFragments.PoeticFeatures: cracked teeth,sparse hair,glassy eyes,exposed muscle,exposed bone,unnaturally bent limbs
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: to persue oblivion,because I want it,because it was mine while I lived,just to have,because it would ease my suffering,for secret reasons I won't tell you
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: oblivion,a way to cease the endless suffering,the answer to why this was allowed to happen
xtagTextFragments.ArableLand: a place to truly belong,the bottom of a ditch

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Violence is splayed in a viscous smear across the environment.

tag.Name: UD_FleshGolems_CorpseDescription

xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: to persue oblivion,because I want it,because it was mine while I lived,just to have,because it would ease my suffering,for secret reasons I won't tell you
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: oblivion,a way to cease the endless suffering,the answer to why this was allowed to happen
xtagTextFragments.ArableLand: a place to truly belong,the bottom of a ditch,a junk-yard
xtagTextFragments.ValuedOre: tinkering bits,p...processing units?..,answers to existential questions

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mound of chrome scraps and dented junk puts some elevation to the ground.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The bite burst into so many strands of sinew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mound of slick feathers and rotting flesh puts some elevation to the ground.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Somehow your stomach still feels empty.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Out of the cracked pieces of shell a few strips of salt-coffined meat preserve.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mound of cracked keratin and rotting flesh puts some elevation to the ground.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes out of this world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mosaic of cracked keratin and dematierialising flesh puts some elevation to the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Simple gore and the reality of death are, in their own right, some manner of disturbing to behold, but are both wholly mundane in the face of the apparent violence necessary to bring about this particular monument to mortality. Worshipped in life, and, perhaps, in death, worshipped at; for what makes a better shrine to the inevitable, than the single most compelling evidence for its existence?

object.Name: UD_FleshGolems Corpse of the Ape God

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Woven fabric, white-bleached and stained with chemicals, creates a barrier between its wearer and the physical dangers of their profession. By cosmic need for balance or merely pure happenstance, this protection is offset by a relentless hubris seemingly instilled in anyone who makes it a habit drape it over their shoulders.
